channel.title: thtmnisamnstr
channel.description: Gavin Johnson's personal site. Resume, blog posts, tech product marketing stuff, maybe some tech-y stuff too.

item.title: Create Grafana Dashboards with Prometheus Data Stored in New Relic
item.description: Learn how to store Prometheus data in New Relic and send that data to Grafana without having to adjust your existing dashboards
item.dc:creator: Gavin Johnson

item.title: Building a Portfolio/Resume Site with Gatsby, Part 3 - Deploying to Firebase
item.description: This is about customizing your Gatsby site. Part 1 was entry-level. Part 2 was work. This is part 3, deploying. When all your work goes public.
item.dc:creator: Gavin Johnson

item.title: How to sign up for New Relic's new perpetual free tier
item.description: New Relic has a new free tier. Here's how to sign up.
item.dc:creator: Gavin Johnson

item.title: Building a Portfolio/Resume Site with Gatsby, Part 2 - Customizing your site and merging your changes
item.description: This is about customizing your Gatsby site. Part 1 was entry-level. This is Part 2 though. Part 2 is much more involved. Part 2 is where you make your site your own.
item.dc:creator: Gavin Johnson

item.title: Building a Portfolio/Resume Site with Gatsby, Part 1 - Setting up your environment and creating a local, themed site
item.description: My personal website sucks. So I'm going to update it using Gatsby.
item.dc:creator: Gavin Johnson
